p: All the authors participated during the fieldwork for the acquisition of flower counts as well as in the writing of thispublication. The main writer was NdS while SC and PC assisted specially in the sections of Remote Sensing and methodology. EM, HM, and FL-N assisted in the writing of all sections regarding with A. longifolia and its biological control as well the study area description and methodology. The image processing task of this publication were performed by NdS.
